ModMetaData.name: [1001]More Precious Minerals (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: papercrane1001
ModMetaData.description:
This mod allows you to find larger mineral lumps using Long Range Mineral Scanner.
By default, minerals will appear %50 more (Configurable 0 - 500% in mod settings).
Like my mod? Donate at: https://ko-fi.com/papercrane1001
I use the MIT license: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT which mostly says that if you use my code, please give me credit.
Version 1.1.1 Original credit to prophetly
